title: Amplifier Wielder

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Wield your amplifier during the night, roleblocking the two people who have the most messages in the previous day chat.
- Once per game, you may wield your amplifier accurately, roleblocking two players of your choice.

desc:
Post 3400
"*So what can you provide for the Mafia?*" ... "*So I have this really distracting amplifier-*"
None / None
